#summary getting to use Eft in a very short time!

1 Prepare the enviroment, Eft is tested under my Windows XP with .Net 3.0 installed. Reference Eft.dll and Windows UI automation dlls: UIAutomationTypes.dll and UIAutomationClient.dll in your test project.

2 write a unit test, with following:
{{{

Application app = Application.Run("calc");
Element main = app.FindTopWindow();

Tester tester = new Tester(app);

tester.Click("1");
tester.Click("+");
tester.Click("2");
tester.Click("=")

Assert.AreEqual("3", main.Find("#result").Text);

}}}

Or, 

{{{

Tester.Click("1", "+", "1", "=");
Assert.AreEqual("3", main.Find("#result").Text);

}}}

That's it!
